endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all registered suppliers in the system.
Obtain a list of all distributors currently associated with the supply chain.
Create a new order request between a supplier and a distributor.
Retrieve a list of all orders placed within the system.
Update the details or status of a specific order.
View the inventory of a specified supplier.
Modify the inventory details of a supplier or distributor.
Fetch the current shipping status of a specific order.
Access analytics and performance metrics of the supply chain.
Retrieve a list of system alerts or notifications for supply chain issues.
